name: Castlemania: Vampires of the Night
description:
Castlemania: Vampires of the Night

Castlemania is a game about vampires(Obviously!) you have to defeat the evil lord that wants do destroy the world with darkness.

Stop him to honor your mothers words of peace!.

Controls:

    Jump: Z

    Boomerang: X

    Dash: C

By BurningSunStudios
